duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide OB and acute GYN care for the office, including cesarean delivery, emergency D & C, 3rd and 4th-degree repairs, and I/s surgery for torsion or ectopic.

Follow the schedule of clinic coverage as well as on-call coverage at the hospital, including call coverage 1-2 weekends per month starting at 7:00am on that Friday and remaining on call until Monday at 7am.
Work in a Trauma level I unit in Middlebury, Vermont, providing care for anticipated procedures and surgeries.
